title: Ubisoft is bringing ‘Rainbow Six Mobile’ to Android and iOS, registration open now
content:
Rainbow Six Siege has been one of the most popular shooter games on PC and consoles for years, and just a few months after its sequel’s launch, a new title in the series is on its way. Today, Ubisoft has revealed that “Rainbow Six Mobile” is coming to Android and iOS.

more…

The post Ubisoft is bringing ‘Rainbow Six Mobile’ to Android and iOS, registration open now appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Ubisoft has announced Rainbow Six Mobile, a version of the hit PC and console game that is coming to Android and iOS.
